I know the feel. Then again, I'm chronically depressed. This doesn't mean I'm miss doom and gloom _all_ the time, I just get weird mood swings, but the general feeling seems to be a lack of will to do anything.

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d174be6368726bdcd40100#post_53d174be6368726bdcd40100
YouTube. He was making racist comments on a video regarding the MH17 crash and said he was happy the 193 Dutch people died, and something about Palestina.
My initial comment was: "did your mom beat you a bit too hard with her slippers and is that why you're taking your tantrum to YouTube, or are you just upset you couldn't have kebab this afternoon?"
His response was: "blah, blah, racist slurs, blah, blah, zionist, blah, blah, blah, here's a picture of your mom." (it was a picture of an ugly hooker)
I responded with: here's a picture of your dad: (link to the following picture)
!http://s28.postimg.org/580kz0fjx/rru.gif!
So he said: "Hah! It doesn't work, white dumbass!"
To which I retorted: "Just like your dad"
